about_me.paragraph: I am a Software Engineer based in Nairobi. Over a period of 2+ years, I have been building web applications with focus on making them simple and user-friendly.
On my free time, I read, spend time with my friends or do courses on technologies that interest me.
You can find me on GitHub where I build web applications projects like this Portfolio or on Linkedin.

project_details.project_desc:
This website. A typical portfolio website where one can display information about themselves such as about section, the services they offer, showcase their projects, testimonials and how to get in touch to them.

I designed this project using Vue Js. Code reusability (Mixins) and components reuse were the core concepts I learnt from designing this portfolio website.

A Todo List App I built with JavaScript. A user adds their Todos, set due date for the Todo, and mark a Todo as done. What I learnt mostly was DOM Manipulation and Persisting data using Web Storage - localStorage.
A Mini-Netflix web application I built with Angular. This application displays a list of movies, movie display image, movie synopsis, ratings, e.t.c. Also users can add movies to their favorites list
Project management app where users can create and manage a project and its related tasks. This project was designed with PHP's CodeIgniter3 Framework. Main Concepts I learnt are CRUD and MySQL.
